mapper.insert: insert into note (noteTarget, noteSender, noteText) values (#{noteTarget}, #{noteSender}, #{noteText})
mapper.delete: delete from note where noteNo>0 and noteNo=#{noteNo};
mapper.select: select count(*) from note where noteNo> 0 and noteTarget=#{noteTarget} and noteSender!=#{noteTarget}
select count(*) from note where noteNo> 0 and noteSender=#{noteSender} and noteTarget!=#{noteSender}
select count(*) from note where noteNo> 0 and noteTarget=#{noteTarget} and noteSender=#{noteTarget}
select count(*) from note where noteNo> 0 and noteTarget=#{noteTarget} and noteSender!=#{noteTarget} and noteTarget!=noteSender and noteSendDate = noteOpenDate
mapper.update: update note set noteOpenDate=now() where noteNo=#{noteNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from note where noteTarget = #{noteTarget}
